isMain.description: If true the extension will use this system

severity.description: Severity level of the system. The higher the more confirms asked for operations

username.description: Your username for the target system

removeFromLocalPath.description: any folder that is between file name and localPath that you want to remove

ignore.description: ignores files/folders matching one of the string. wildcards can be used

include.description: includes files/folders matching one of the string. wildcards can be used (not ignore). If the same item is added in both ignore and include it will be included.

rootConfig.description:
Gets the config from other miisync.json file. Can be relative or absolute path. 
Must point to where .vscode is located

uploadOnSave.description: Uploads the current file to the system whenever you save it.

downloadOnOpen.description: Downloads the file to the system whenever you open it.
